text: John Ford was so funny that I couldn't wait to go to work in the morning.
author: Richard Widmark

text: I get up in the morning, torture a typewriter until it screams, then stop.
author: Clarence Budington Kelland

text: This morning's scene is good and fine, Long rain has not harmed the land.
author: Du Fu

text: Directing is: you're overwhelmed the whole time. Your mind never stops. If you care about it. You wake up in the morning and you begin thinking about it and then you go to sleep at night and you're still thinking about it.
author: Campbell Scott

text: I feel pretty good when I get out of bed in the morning. I don't feel all beat up, which is nice.
author: Drew Bledsoe
